availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Ephraim January and Sarah McConnell January. Married to Sarah January. Father of Robert G. January, Emma January, Horace January. Merchant in Mason County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p.321.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p.3.
Marquis Boultinghouse, Silversmiths, Jewelers, Watch & Clock Makers of Kentucky, 1785-1900, (Lexington, 1980), 165-9.
